token.join: optional: join b(ack) or a(fter) for punctuation marks

lemma.id: contains the id number of the entry in the database consisting of the set of all word forms + morphological analyses of all Greek texts
lemma.l1: as many l1 elements as the lemmas found in PerseusUnderPhilologic for the relevant word form AND morphological analysis
lemma.l2: as many l2 elements as the lemmas found in Morpheus for the relevant word form AND morphological analysis
